title: Documentation Home
content: Andy Auth is a modern OAuth 2.1 and OpenID Connect authorization server built for AI assistants and MCP integration.

title: Quick Start
content: Get Andy Auth running locally in 5 minutes. Clone, start PostgreSQL, run the server, test OAuth flow.

title: Installation
content: Prerequisites, cloning the repository, database setup, running locally, Docker installation.

title: Configuration
content: appsettings.json structure, environment variables, database connection strings, OpenIddict settings, CORS, rate limiting.

content: Proof Key for Code Exchange, code verifier, code challenge, S256 method, security protection.

content: Refresh token rotation, offline_access scope, token renewal, session management.

title: Claims
